title: NHS marching band in Bands of America Super Regional
text: NHS marching band in Bands of America Super Regional The Wildcat Pride Marching Band of Neosho High School participated last weekend in the Bands of America Super Regional at the Edward Jones Dome in St. Louis. The national-level event had bands from 15 states. The NHS band showcased new uniforms while earning an “excellent” rating. This is a division higher than wh...   Writer Posted Oct. 20, 2015 at 9:58 PM Posted Oct. 20, 2015 at 9:58 PM The Wildcat Pride Marching Band of Neosho High School participated last weekend in the Bands of America Super Regional at the Edward Jones Dome in St. Louis. The national-level event had bands from 15 states. The NHS band showcased new uniforms while earning an “excellent” rating. This is a division higher than what was achieved last year. The band’s score also was significantly higher and was within a point of many large band programs in the state. The band watched a number of performances that included past national champions, past national finalists and the current national champion. The band will compete this weekend in Kansas City. Neosho Daily News - Neosho, MO Writer
